dcterms:creator: Florian Fuchs
Yunlong Song
Elia Kaufmann
Davide Scaramuzza
Peter Durr
dcterms:description: Gran Turismo Sport (GTS) is a high-fidelity realistic racing simulator known for its real-world dynamics, used to demonstrate super-human performance in a time trial setting through deep reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Gran Turismo Sport (GTS)

dcterms:creator: Bernhard Wymann
Eric Espié
Christophe Guionneau
Christos Dimitrakakis
Andrew Sumner Rémi Coulom
dcterms:description: TORCS is an open-source racing simulator that allows for end-to-end vehicle control using images of the road as observations.
dcterms:title: TORCS (The Open Racing Car Simulator)

dcterms:creator: Alexey Dosovitskiy
German Ros
Felipe Codevilla
Antonio Lopez
Vladlen Koltun
dcterms:description: CARLA is an open urban driving simulator that provides necessary observations for driving operations, such as cameras and distance sensors, but is not as realistic for racing dynamics.
dcterms:title: CARLA

dcterms:creator: Peide Cai
Xiaodong Mei
Lei Tai
Yuxiang Sun
Ming Liu
dcterms:description: Data collected from experienced drivers in CARLA for high-speed autonomous drifting, used to formulate drift control as a trajectory-following task.
dcterms:title: Data collected from experienced drivers in CARLA

dcterms:description: Data collected for regression learning during the experiments described in the paper, specifically game screen images.
dcterms:title: Data collected for regression learning (game screen images)
